member.name: T:GMOKeefe.Compiler.Lexer.FullReader
member.summary: Reads the given text file in its entirety.

member.name: M:GMOKeefe.Compiler.Lexer.FullReader.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Creates a FullReader given the path of the file to be read.
member.param: The path of the file to be read.

member.name: M:GMOKeefe.Compiler.Lexer.FullReader.Done
member.summary: Indicates whether the FullReader has been used or not.
member.returns: A boolean value indicating if the FullReader has been fully used.

member.name: M:GMOKeefe.Compiler.Lexer.FullReader.Read
member.summary: Reads the text file.
member.returns: The entire contents of the text file.

member.name: T:GMOKeefe.Compiler.Lexer.IReader
member.summary: The Reader interface.\ Defines the functionality necessary for the Lexer to read code.

member.name: M:GMOKeefe.Compiler.Lexer.IReader.Done
member.summary: Indicates whether the Reader has been used or not.
member.returns: A boolean value indicating if the Reader has been fully used.

member.name: M:GMOKeefe.Compiler.Lexer.IReader.Read
member.summary: Reads the text file, either whole or in part.
member.returns: Some portion of the text in the text file.

member.name: T:GMOKeefe.Compiler.Lexer.LineReader
member.summary: Reads the given text file line-by-line.

member.name: M:GMOKeefe.Compiler.Lexer.LineReader.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Creates a LineReader given the path of the file to be read.
member.param: The path of the file to be read.

member.name: M:GMOKeefe.Compiler.Lexer.LineReader.Done
member.summary: Indicates whether the LineReader has been used or not.
member.returns: A boolean value indicating if the LineReader has been fully used.

member.name: M:GMOKeefe.Compiler.Lexer.LineReader.Read
member.summary: Reads one line of the text file.
member.returns: One line of the text file.

member.name: T:GMOKeefe.Compiler.Lexer.Tokenizer
member.summary: Tokenizes text files for parsing.

member.summary: Constructs a Tokenizer to break down the given file.
member.param: The path of the file to be lexed.
member.exception: Thrown when the file path is null.

member.name: M:GMOKeefe.Compiler.Lexer.Tokenizer.Tokens
member.summary: Tokenizes the text file in a way that is more interpretable to the compiler.
